data.message: My reaction buttons are not there not on my iPhone and IPad! I don't know why? All my friends they have it but only me can't get it please let me know how can I get it.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Sirikarn. We recommend that you update your mobile app in order to have access to Reactions. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1RHPJ5S. -Jordan
An update is not available it was updated in February and only shows an open button when I go to the App Store
Mine work fine on iPad and iphone
Donna M. Boelema how did u get it I can't
My iPhone says its up to date yet no reactions still just like bekki ! So how can I make it update so I can get the reactions?
Mine is the same. Updated 22 feb and no update available
Mine doesn't work either

Mine doesn't work either. I have Uninstalled facebook twice and disabled it no luck. When I get on the desktop it doesn't work for me but If I log out on my phone and get on my husband's facebook on the same phone they work for his facebook???
Try just turning your phone off and on again.
I just updated my iPhone and still NO reactions pop up when you hold down the like button. So how can I make it update so I can get the reactions?
My phone is up to date but I still do not have this iPhone feature.
Nope
Exactly, we all have the same problem. The app is up to date. I set mine to be autoupdate too. I tried deleting the app, reinstalling it, and still nothing happened. HELPPPPPPP!
Same as above my app is up to date and mine doesn't have them :(
Doesn't work on my iPad or iPhone either.
I'm having the same issue. I'm up to date. Even got a new phone a few days ago and it doesn't work on here either.
Mine were there, now there gone. I also have an iPhone and my Facebook app was updated today.
I had to restart my iPhone. Then they worked.
I have the same situation. :( Please fix it as soon as possible. O:)
I have the same problem. It doesn't work.
Maybe you guys should uninstall it and then reinstall it and see if that works.
Sometimes it's just a glitch that reinstalling will help fix... Hope this helps someone.
I just updated my app today,still doesn't work
i don't have them either i think its our accounts my friend logged into my phone and it worked fine on his so is Facebook going to fix this? if not might just deactivate my account
